Html:
Hi,

I just found this GMap and this is a great projects.

And now I want to used my own satellite images (tiff) as the sources for the map.

My idea was to export the map into the cache. Any suggestion on how to do it?

Howsit Radioman,

Is it possible to use your own tiff images, rasters and vectors as layers on the map?

hmmm...
So what do i need to do to get it going? Where do i start, is there an example i can look at?

I am excited to try and get this going :)
i mean, there is no built-in functionality, but you can render basically whatever you want on top of the map
Or you could write your own map provider, like I did. Generate tiles from your images with Maperative and host the tiles in IIS.
you don't even really need iis, your provider can read tiles directly from disk/etc, File.ReadAllBytes(...)...
